ghost sees the city rising up ahaead. the city looks as if it were gutted and 
then burned. sparks skitter over the city surfaces. greco-roman columns 
composed of metal and wire stand as a testament to what was once there.
ghost: man, oh man! you people were not kidding about the city! 
goth: it looks like some serious work needs to be done here. how can we be of 
any service?

--part1_164.7c35fb5.29849b1f_boundary
